entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy this evening and ending after midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
